text.section: A petition for a temporary fuel variance shall be filed with the Department in the form the Department requires.

The petition shall contain:
The name, address, and telephone number of the petitioner and any other person who is authorized to receive notices on behalf of the petitioner;
The type and location of the operations for which the temporary fuel variance is sought;
An explanation of why the petitioner is unable to obtain the necessary required fuel; and
A description of:
The process that is causing emissions and the quantity and nature of existing emissions;
The specific variance sought, including:
The starting and ending dates of the requested variance; and
The type, sulphur content, and quantity of the fuel that the petitioner proposes to use; and
The amount and type of:
The current fuel inventory of the petitioner; and
Any fuel reserves at any facility that is owned or operated by the petitioner.
The petitioner shall verify the information in the petition.
